alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:46PM CDT until July 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN JUNEAU AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 445 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mauston to 12 miles southeast of New Lisbon to 7 miles north of Reedsburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Juneau and southern Adams Counties, including the following locations...County Roads B And P, Dells Timberland Campground, County Roads B And K, Lyndon Station and Stand Rock Campground. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 57 and 86. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
